title: Enhancing enzymatic digestibility of bamboo residues using a combined low severity steam explosion and green liquor-sulfite pretreatment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7609-7615
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00930D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yang Xing, Yushen Jin, Hui Li, Jianxin Jiang, Bing Shao
Bamboo is pretreated by a combination of steam explosion (SE) and green liquor-sulfite (GL-S). Enzymatic hydrolysis efficiency is improved by SE–GL-S pretreatment.
